latest.title: Parallax Scrolling Effect
latest.description: Create a parallax scrolling effect when the object is moved up and down the screen causing it to slowly move. It also has a bounce effect when the object goes past a certain point.

latest.title: JavaScript Blob
latest.description: Use it to download files quickly and convert files to other formats. It is a quick way of managing and manipulating files.

latest.title: jQuery Social Counts
latest.description: Get share, like, ... counts from Facebook, Twitter, ...

latest.title: Custom comment/forum For Your Website
latest.description: No need for third-parties to have a commenting system for your website. Using Google Forms and jQuery to fetch the comments from the spreadsheet.

latest.title: Recover Lost Network Password
latest.description: Use CMD to recover a forgotten newtork/wifi password.

latest.title: Check Internet Speed
latest.description: Using jQuery to calculate the Ping, Download and Upload speed of your internet connection.

latest.title: Pinterest Like Design
latest.description: Create a web page to look like Pinterest. The columns have items situated underneath each other without aligning itself with the other objects.
